    • Uses of ClassLoaderPolicy in i5.las2peer.classLoaders.policies

      Subclasses of ClassLoaderPolicy in i5.las2peer.classLoaders.policies 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultPolicy
      Default policies with no restrictions.
      class  RestrictivePolicy
      Policy aimed for production use: Restricts access from the service to the node and some JDK methods.
